Sentencas: The development of symmetrical solid oxide fuel cells (SSOFCs) faces a significant challenge in designing electrode materials that exhibit both high activity and stability.
Titulo: RuOx modified PrBaFe1.8Hf0.2O5+δ surface for boosting the performance of symmetrical solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, a novel layered perovskite oxide symmetric electrode material PrBaFe1.8Hf0.2O5+delta (PBFH) for SSOFCs is proposed and synthesized.
Titulo: RuOx modified PrBaFe1.8Hf0.2O5+δ surface for boosting the performance of symmetrical solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Doping Hf at the B-site of PrBaFe2O5+delta (PBF) improves the stability in reducing atmosphere and increases the concentration of oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: RuOx modified PrBaFe1.8Hf0.2O5+δ surface for boosting the performance of symmetrical solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, a small amount of RuOx is deposited by atomic layer deposition (ALD) onto PrBaFe1.8Hf0.2O5+delta scaffold as symmetric electrodes.
Titulo: RuOx modified PrBaFe1.8Hf0.2O5+δ surface for boosting the performance of symmetrical solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The surface modification of ALD-RuOx significantly boosts the catalytic activity for both fuel oxidation and oxygen reduction, simultaneously.
Titulo: RuOx modified PrBaFe1.8Hf0.2O5+δ surface for boosting the performance of symmetrical solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Compared to PBF electrodes, the interfacial polarization resistances of RuOx-PBFH decrease to 0.77 omega cm2 under H2/Ar and 0.021 omega cm2 under air atmosphere at 800 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: RuOx modified PrBaFe1.8Hf0.2O5+δ surface for boosting the performance of symmetrical solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C, SSOFCs equipped with RuOx-PBFH symmetric electrodes exhibit a high peak power density of 0.85 W cm-2 and 0.41 W cm-2 using humidified hydrogen and propane as fuels, respectively.
Titulo: RuOx modified PrBaFe1.8Hf0.2O5+δ surface for boosting the performance of symmetrical solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the RuOx-PBFH electrode demonstrates long-lasting performance, displaying high resistance against coking.
Titulo: RuOx modified PrBaFe1.8Hf0.2O5+δ surface for boosting the performance of symmetrical solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These findings reveal a facile ALD approach for tailoring symmetric perovskite electrodes, offering robust and efficient electrocatalysis with efficient noble metal utilization.
Titulo: RuOx modified PrBaFe1.8Hf0.2O5+δ surface for boosting the performance of symmetrical solid oxide fuel cells
